Articles.Content:
Well he did it again. this shows how knowledge has different formats and some are easyer to understand.

Personally this is why i cant wait for schools to implement something else than those little prints on slices of dead treas.

I am sure PBS idea channel addressed this topic sometime but i am too lazy to go search for it.
i love XKCD and read it and the What if? site religiously. this comic made me smile big and feel extra special inside
